phrases: I am sure you have probably changed your face and name, and have hidden yourself.
We need to find out about any people who have gone missing recently.
Do you think he would commit murders again in that state?
Serial killers like him cannot easily keep their impulses in check.
Are you sure we do not need to do anything?
We have not been able to find a single clue about Kira yet.
That is what I was thinking, too.
But Jotaro said it was fine.
He said he will have us move when he finds something out,
but until then, he wants us to continue being students.
I would rather look for Kira than study.
We managed to corner him that one time,
so it should be pretty easy, should not it?
As long as I am repairing my house, I would like to do some renovations, too.
He is actually taking pictures of everyone to try to find him!
I guess I will have someone come by to give me an estimate.
Jotaro and all of his other Stand users are doing whatever they want...
I need to make a new Stand user
to take care of those meddlesome bastards...
There is no doubt about it!
Even though his appearance has changed,
our bond as father and son bring us together.
There is no way I would mistake my own son!
I am going to find out
who the guy disguised as my dad really is.
At this rate, those Stand users will...
I will not allow that to happen!
I am going to be late...
And I have got class duties today!
I stayed up way too late last night.
I got plenty of sleep, so I am in top shape again today.
There is a pair of binoculars on the ground.
You are so easily intrigued by things that are on the ground.
Do not scare us like that, Mikitaka.
You are going to give me a heart attack, damn it!
You showed up at a good time.
There is something I wanted to get straightened out.
The thing about you being an alien is a lie, right?
You are just a Stand user who thinks he is an alien, right?
Stop being ambiguous and clear things up, damn it!
I have been clear from the beginning.
Why are you talking like that all of a sudden?
More importantly, what are you doing,
turning into binoculars on the road like that?
I wanted you two to look at that thing,
so I was waiting here for you.
The electrical pylon right in front of you.
That is not really an electrical pylon.
It is a remnant stripped of its wires that is no longer in use.
When construction started on Morioh's residential areas,
most of the cables got put underground, so these were not needed anymore.
Are you trying to communicate with some other planet?
There is smoke coming out of the middle of that pylon, is not there?
Please take a good look at it.
It is, like, 20 meters off the ground!
Would you mind taking a look about five meters higher?
There is a guy up there!
He must be living on that pylon.
He is actually making a living there!
He is fishing from the river, and even has cucumbers growing.
So it is basically a self-sufficient dwelling.
Some people in this world do very strange things.
It is a new Stand user!
But what is a Stand user doing living up there?
It would seem there is a need to find out more about that man.
It is been a while since I have spoken to other people.
It looks like he sees us, too.
We still do not know if that Stand user is a friend or foe.
I am in a bit of a hurry right... now...
Looking at it up close, it is bigger than I thought.
Do not come any closer to this pylon.
I just relieved myself, so you need to step back, or you will be in trouble.
D-Do not tell me this is...
You will get covered in feces and urine!
I made it spray like that so I could fertilize the wildflowers over there!
I like to recycle everything I possibly can.
On the right are Asiatic dayflowers, mountain udo, and watercress.
Not to mention, if there are wildflowers around,
I can catch wild rabbits that come to eat them,
so it is killing two birds with one stone.
So you really are living up there?
Does not this pylon belong to the electric company?
This is my house that I bought with my own money.
I bought this abandoned pylon for 100,000 yen
and made it my own ideal self-sufficient house!
Because I am self-sufficient, I do not have to work at any company.
And even if I never leave here, I get all the exercise I need by moving around the pylon.
Take a look at this spectacular view.
Just how long have you been living on this pylon?
I probably have not touched the ground in about a month.
I had no idea that an idiot like this lived in Morioh.
This guy is not an enemy, he is just a damn weirdo.
I do not think he is going to attack us.
I guess, for now, we can just head back and report to Jotaro.
Well, I guess kids take videos, too...
But since he is hiding behind that pillar,
it looks like he is doing the same thing I am.
He is following someone and recording their actions...
Could he be recording someone here?
Josuke, you have not left for school yet?
How dare he take a bite out of my favorite
Kamakura Custar and then put it back in the fridge?!
Not to mention, there should have been two left.
That kid seriously pisses me off.
Hey, something fell out of your pocket.
Would you guys mind leaving now?
You do not have to pick it up.
I will get it myself later.
I knew the ghost dad was involved in this!
So you have finally come in.
I have been waiting for this.
When you tell people to come in, they become guarded and do not come in.
But if you tell people not to come in, they get pissed off and come in.
You have finally stepped into Superfly, Josuke Higashikata!
Well done luring that idiot Josuke into Superfly!
No, Kira's dad is right there!
You see, when someone enters this pylon,
they cannot get out until the next person comes in.
If they try to force their way out, they become a part of the pylon themselves.
You fell for it, Josuke Higashikata!
Do not let him get away, Toyohiro Kanedaichi!
I said it was my Stand,
but Superfly is not a Stand that I can control.
It is actually an independent Stand.
I can finally leave, now that you guys have shown up.
Even I, its user, was held captive by Superfly.
Well, good luck living here in my stead!
He must have been working with the guy in the photograph.
Okuyasu, is there anything that I can do?
You will just get hurt, so stay out of it.
If you could actually turn into dynamite instead of
dice or binoculars and blow this pylon up, things might be different.
I cannot produce any strength that is not my own,
and I cannot turn into anything complicated like explosives.
But I would like to be of some use.
I am telling you that there is nothing you can do.
Leave the dangerous stuff to us.
That bastard's starting to run away because he is convinced
that he is got him trapped in there,
but he must not know who we are.
You going to do this, Okuyasu?
I know you are up to it, too.
What is the big deal about this pylon?
There should not be an issue if I crush it and get out!
But if we keep attacking it, this pillar will snap in two.
It looks like that guy's about to fall off.
How can you do something so terrifying?
Of course I thought about that possibility.
This pylon is draining your powers and
What the hell is that idiot talking about?
Josuke, just a little more, and you will be out of there!
It is the sound of all the power you guys threw
into the pylon, moving throughout it.
You know that whole law of conservation of energy?
Energy that is running around has to be able to escape from somewhere.
So where is all that energy's going to go?
You can attack it all you want,
but all the attacks on the pylon are just going to come right back to you.
If you hit it, it will hit back.
If you cut it, it will cut back.
No matter who comes around with whatever kind of ability,
no one can destroy this pylon!
I could not dodge it completely.
It ripped a hole in my side.
I guess I should have warned you about that.
And next, you are probably going to think
that if you defeat me, the user, you will be able to get out.
This pylon is an independent Stand.
Even if I were to die,
this pylon would probably continue to trap people inside for eternity.
But do not get too depressed about that.
You just have to lure someone else in, Josuke Higashikata.
If one comes in, one can get out.
Just have some sucker take your place and get out.
It is sort of like playing Old Maid.
You just need to pass off the old maid to someone else.
Indeed, if someone else is pulled in, Josuke will be saved.
You should be the one to return, then.
Why were you an electrical wire?
What the hell is that ability?
You see, I am an alien.
Josuke, hurry up and get out.
The guy in the photograph did not tell me
that Josuke had a friend like you!
I am an alien, so I am unaware of this game called Old Maid,
but to suddenly trick Josuke and tell him that he cannot leave...
It is like an adult beating a child at a game
on New Year's by tricking them.
This is why you should be the one to remain in the pylon.
After all the time I spent living here, I ended up
with these thick calluses on my hands.
There is a lot of stuff in here.
It seems you are under the impression that that is a part of me,
but the pylon's wire that you were hanging off of earlier.
Now, go to the top and come back out, Mikitaka!
You are the one who finally stepped into this pylon.
Do you really think I would let you escape?
I am a man who has thought of nothing but getting out of here every single day!
This pylon will return whatever you do to it.
That wire's also a part of this pylon!
The angle at which the wire was cut was made so it would return to you.
Hurry up and get out of there!
I can fix a wound like that!
Nope, he is not getting out.
I am the one who is going to leave!
The direction and angle are perfect.
If you strike it, it will strike back.
I went through some trouble getting out because of you,
but now I can get out easily.
I am sure that is going to hurt when you try and pry those out,
but you will have plenty of time to treat it later.
There are some medicinal plants down there, too.
Do you think you can escape just because you are out of there?
I will chase you to the ends of the Earth, damn it!
Of course I can escape, and rather easily.
You guys have not even been able to find Yoshikage Kira, have you?
I have never seen him before.
I will find him out... no matter what.
